titles.title: Increased Transparency in 501(c)(4) Organizations Act of 2020
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require the disclosure of notifications of intent to operate under section 501(c)(4).
Increased Transparency in 501(c)(4) Organizations Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Increased Transparency in 501(c)(4) Organizations Act of 2020
This bill requires tax-exempt organizations to make available for public inspection notifications that must be submitted to the Internal Revenue Service regarding the intent to operate under section 501(c)(4) of the Internal Revenue Code.
